content: break yarn thread through live stitches 2 3 times and fasten_off weave in remaining ends soak in cool water and wool wash and block to measurements pom pom make a 3 7 5 cm diameter pompom using mc secure pom pom to hat and tie off inside label using sewing thread and a sharp sewing needle sew-on kelbourne woolens label to brim as shown ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 3 august hat sarah solomon body chart body chart 21 21 20 20 19 19 18 18 17 17 16 16 15 15 14 14 13 13 12 12 11 11 10 10 9 9 8 8 7 7 6 6 5 5 4 4 3 3 2 2 1 1 pattern repeat pattern repeat crown chart crown chart chart key 24 24 knit in mc 23 23 22 22 k2tog in mc 21 21 20 20 s2kp in mc 19 19 18 18 knit in cc 17 17 16 16 k2tog in cc 15 15 14 14 13 13 12 12 11 11 10 10 9 9 8 8 7 7 6 6 5 5 4 4 3 3 2 2 1 1 pattern repeat pattern repeat ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 4 share with us follow us on instagram @kelbournewoolens and show us your projects using the hashtags #kelbournewoolens #kwyearofhats ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved images © linette kielinski v 1 8 16 19 not to be reproduced or re-knit for sale or profit 5
